name: Observations On A Nearly Lifeless Planet
name_original: Observations On A Nearly Lifeless Planet
description:
Observations On A Nearly Lifeless Planet is a short walking simulator I made for one of my college courses. Explore an alien terrain and scan objects to unlock audio logs and learn what happened here.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Hold Right Click: Datapad

Hold Left Click: Scanner

ESC: Pause
